100.name: Permafrost
100.description: Bloons move slowly even after thawing out.

200.name: Cold Snap
200.description: Can freeze and pop Lead Bloons and Camo Bloons.

300.name: Ice Shards
300.description: Razor sharp shards fly out when Frozen Bloons pop.

400.name: Embrittlement
400.description: Can hit MOAB class Bloons. All hit Bloons become brittle, take extra damage while frozen, and lose Camo properties.

500.name: Super Brittle
500.description: Bloons take huge damage while frozen including MOAB-class Bloons.

010.name: Enhanced Freeze
010.description: Attacks faster and freezes for longer.

030.name: Arctic Wind
030.description: Greatly increases pierce & gains a super cold aura that slows Bloons and freezes water nearby.

040.name: Snowstorm
040.description: Snowstorm Ability: Freezes all regular bloons on screen, and briefly freezes white, zebra, camo, and slows MOAB class.

050.name: Absolute Zero
050.description: Ability is so cold it freezes all regular Bloons for longer, including White, Zebra, and Camo, slows MOAB-class longer, and greatly increases the attack speed of all Ice Monkeys for the duration.

002.name: Re-Freeze
002.description: Can re-freeze Bloons that are already frozen.

003.name: Cryo Cannon
003.description: Shoots freezing bombs at Bloons over long range.

004.name: Icicles
004.description: Frozen Bloons grow sharp icicles that can pop Bloons that touch them.

005.name: Icicle Impale
005.description: Shoots huge icicle spikes that do huge damage to MOAB-Class Bloons and freezes them.
